mapper.select: select * from fna_db order by f_idx desc limit #{offset}, #{limit}
mapper.insert: insert into fna_db (f_idx, a_idx, f_tle, f_fcon, f_acon, f_dat) values (#{f_idx}, #{a_idx}, #{f_tle}, #{f_fcon}, #{f_acon}, now())
mapper.update: update fna_db set a_idx = #{a_idx}, f_tle = #{f_tle}, f_fcon = #{f_fcon}, f_acon = #{f_acon}, f_up = now() where f_idx = #{f_idx}
